text: @SpeakerPelosi Thank you Mr. President for always having our backs @realDonaldTrump! If @SpeakerPelosi is against it...it’s the right thing to do! POTUS is trying to save us from a pandemic & this idiot is trying to impeach him! #CoronavirusPandemic #WeNeedANewSpeaker #Trump2020NowMoreThanEver
